meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>middle</kanji> <kanji>help</kanji> in the army or navy is the <vocabulary>lieutenant colonel</vocabulary> or the <vocabulary>navy commander</vocabulary>. I'm guessing these ranks are kind of in the middle or middle high end of the ranking scales?
